SELECT A.*, B.*, C.*, D.comtCnt FROM TB_CHANGOOS_BLOG A LEFT JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_BLOG_IMAGE B ON BLOG_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_BLOG_FILE C ON BLOG_SEQ = C.BOARD_SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_SEQ, COUNT(COMT_SEQ) as comtCnt FROM TB_CHANGOOS_BLOG_COMT GROUP BY BOARD_SEQ) D ON BLOG_SEQ = D.BOARD_SEQ
WHERE BLOG_SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT DISTINCT BLOG_TAG FROM TB_CHANGOOS_BLOG
AND BLOG_ENABLED = true
